ruleBookContent: class.readerCon@tag.p@textNodes#.*\W完本神站\W.*|(?m)^([^\d\w]+|[Pp][Ss][：:].+)$|—{3,}|一秒记住、永不丢失！
ruleChapterName: tag.a@text@js:result.replace(/[（［【\{\(].*?[更合求票赏鲜盟修推歉谢祝节年].*?[）］】\}\)]/,"")
ruleFindUrl:
<js>
var a=["所有","玄幻","奇幻","武侠","仙侠","都市","军事","历史","游戏","竞技","科幻","悬疑","灵异","其他","古言","仙侠奇缘","言情","青春","玄幻言情","悬疑灵异","科幻空间","游戏竞技","BL文","GL人文","二次元"];
var b=["更","完"];
var c=["  30","  50"," 100"," 200","200+"];
var d=["更新","点击","推荐","收藏"];
var e=["lastupdate","allvisit","allvote","goodnum"];
var x="";
for (var i=1;i<a.length;i++)
{
for (var j=0;j<b.length;j++)
{
for (var k=1;k<c.length+1;k++)
{
for (var l=1;l<d.length;l++)
{
x= x+d[l]+"["+b[j]+"]:"+a[i]+"/"+c[k-1]+"万"+"::/all/"+i+"_"+e[l]+"_"+k+"_"+j+"_"+l+".html&&";
}
}
}
}
result=x;
String(result);
</js>

<js>
str1=java.ajax("http://zuopinj.com/writer/huaren.html");
str2=java.ajax("http://zuopinj.com/writer/guowai.html");
str3=java.ajax("http://zuopinj.com/writer/wuxia.html");
str4=java.ajax("http://zuopinj.com/writer/yanqing.html");
reg1=/href=".*?(\.zuopinj\.com\/" title).*?".+?<\/a>/gi;
result1=String(str1.match(reg1)).replace(/href="(.+?)".*?>(.+?)作品集<\/a>,?/gi,"\[中\]$2::$1&&");
result2=String(str2.match(reg1)).replace(/href="(.+?)".*?>(.+?)作品集<\/a>,?/gi,"\[外\]$2::$1&&");
result3=String(str3.match(reg1)).replace(/href="(.+?)".*?>(.+?)作品集<\/a>,?/gi,"\[武侠\]$2::$1&&");
result4=String(str4.match(reg1)).replace(/href="(.+?)".*?>(.+?)作品集<\/a>,?/gi,"\[言情\]$2::$1&&");
result=result1+result2+result3+result4;
</js>
